publicwhip.spmotion: *S2M-2067.1 Mr Stewart Maxwell: Timetabling of Sewel Motions—As an amendment to motion (S2M-2067) in the name of Donald Gorrie, insert at end "as a first step to bringing to an end the use of this undemocratic mechanism and ensure that the Scottish Parliament makes all decisions on matters devolved to it until such time as we have a Parliament with all the full powers of an independent nation state."

S2M-2067.1 Mr Stewart Maxwell: Timetabling of Sewel Motions—As an amendment to motion (S2M-2067) in the name of Donald Gorrie, insert at end "as a first step to bringing to an end the use of this undemocratic mechanism and ensure that the Scottish Parliament makes all decisions on matters devolved to it until such time as we have a Parliament with all the full powers of an independent nation state." Supported by: Campbell Martin*, Jim Mather*
S2M-2067.1 Timetabling of Sewel Motions (lodged on 25 November 2004) Stewart Stevenson*, Mr Adam Ingram*, Rob Gibson*
S2M-2067.1 Timetabling of Sewel Motions (lodged on 25 November 2004) Fergus Ewing*, Ms Sandra White*
S2M-2067.1 Timetabling of Sewel Motions (lodged on 25 November 2004) Linda Fabiani*
